name.ja: <ruby>七<rt>しち</rt></ruby><ruby>宝<rt>ほう</rt></ruby><ruby>神<rt>じん</rt></ruby>－<ruby>米<rt>べい</rt></ruby><ruby>大<rt>だい</rt></ruby>

summoning_condition.en: If you have a monster with 2700 DEF or "Ship of Seven Treasures" in your Graveyard, you can Special Summon this card from your hand face-up to your field.

effect.en: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard. Then, you can make 1 face-up monster on your opponent's field lose 700 ATK/DEF until the end of your opponent's next turn.
